title: My Watch Notifier
summary: Gives vibrate notification on your android wear for all applications
description: * Gives you an option to select the applications for which when there is a notification your Android Wear device will vibrate.* Now you can configure also custom vibration pattern per application* Additional filters - gives you the ability to configure even further the notifications by specifying custom vibration pattern for different keywords that are contained in the notificationIMPORTANT: In order to work you have to allow the application to receive all the notifications from Settings -> Security -> Notification accessAlso please if you have any ideas or comments regarding the application feel free to send them to me via email.*** Alpha Version ***The Alpha testers community - https://plus.google.com/communities/115320085267378492716
descriptionHTML:
* Gives you an option to select the applications for which when there is a notification your Android Wear device will vibrate.
* Now you can configure also custom vibration pattern per application
* Additional filters - gives you the ability to configure even further the notifications by specifying custom vibration pattern for different keywords that are contained in the notification

IMPORTANT: In order to work you have to allow the application to receive all the notifications from Settings -> Security -> Notification access

Also please if you have any ideas or comments regarding the application feel free to send them to me via email.

*** Alpha Version ***
The Alpha testers community - https://plus.google.com/communities/115320085267378492716
comments: Mate 7 This is a necessary app for official Mate 7 lollipop to gain access to the notification center. I'm using it with a gear fit
Just what I was looking for Great app, just what Android Wear needed. Developer is very helpful, replies to emails, and tries to fix bugs.
Not in Notifications access App not appear in notifications access list.
Thank you! Thank you so much guys! This app does exactly what it says! Super useful.
